Archetype-Marshal -- Male Changeling Human Fighter: 10
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +3 Charisma: +2
Background: Emissary Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 9011/10000 Level: 10 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Hardy Traveler: +1 Encumbered Bulk/+1 Maximum Bulk
Hardy Traveler: +10' Speed during overland travel
Features/Skills

General Feats: General Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 5 from any)
Changeling Heritage: Has the changeling trait and may take changeling ancestry feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Marshal Dedication: Has a 15' martial's aura emanation
Perception: +19 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Accounting Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Dragon Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Gladitorial Lore: +20 (intelligence; master) Society: +20 (intelligence; master)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +14 (charisma; trained) Stealth: +16 (dexterity; trained)
Athletics: +14 (strength; trained) Medicine: +3 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +15 (wisdom; trained)

Skill Training (Accounting Lore): Skill Trained (Accounting Lore)
Skill Training (Tea Lore): Skill Trained (Tea Lore)
Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 22 on Athletics checks
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Impressive Performance: Can use Performance to Make An Impression
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 26 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bastard Sword (+16 1d8+2 S [2h d12]; strength; expert); Longbow (+18 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Maul (+16 1d12+2 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Spears): Attack Master (Simple Spears; Martial Spears)/Attack Expert (Advanced Spears)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Tactical Cadence: Has increased Cadence Call effects
Unconventional Weaponry (Temple Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Temple Sword)
Back To Back: When adjacent to an ally, foes must flank both self and the ally in order to inflict off-guard on either
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Cadence Call: (1) Each ally within aura gains an extra Stride or Strike during their next turn once per min
Combat Flexibility: Gains 1 chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level during daily prep
Coordinated Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a Stride; success allows each ally within 60' to Stride toward the target
Dread Marshal Stance: (1) Successful Intimidation check enters a stance that gives self and allies within aura a damage bonus equal to the number of weapon damage dice and causes critical hits to inflict frightened 1; critical failure prevents retrying for 1 min
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Inspiring Marshal Stance: (1) Successful Diplomacy check enters a stance that gives self and allies within aura +1 attacks and saves vs. mental effects; critical failure prevents retrying for 1 min
Rallying Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a Stride; success gives allied observers 2 temporary Hit Points until the start of the next turn
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Snap Out Of It!: (1) Gives an ally within aura a +1 Will save vs. a mental effect that lasts up to 1 min once per target per 10 min
Steel Yourself!: (1) Gives an ally within aura 2 temporary Hit Points and +2 Fortitude until the start of the next turn
Target Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a -2 ranged Strike in response to an ally's successful ranged Strike against the same foe
To Battle!: (1) Allows an ally within aura to use a reaction to Stride; using 2 actions instead allows an ally to use a reaction to Strike
Topple Foe: (R) Makes a Trip attempt on an adjacent foe in response to the triggering hit by an ally on that foe
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; master); Reflex: +18 (dexterity; expert); Will: +17 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Battle Hardened: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Battle Hardened: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Marshal Dedication: Marshal's aura gives self and allies +1 vs. fear
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 6 available vs. 13 allocated
Coordinated Charge Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 12 and marshal dedication feature (currently 1)
Tactical Cadence Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 14 and cadence call feature (currently 1)
Target Of Opportunity Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 14 and marshal dedication feature (currently 1)
